widgetType.name: date_range
widgetType.documentation: Widget used to search on a date range.

widgetType.name: faceted_search_users_suggestion
widgetType.documentation: Widget allowing to search and select one or more users with a suggestion box.

widgetType.name: faceted_search_wrapper
widgetType.documentation: Template widget dedicated to wrap other sub widgets. It displays the widget label, and list the sub widgets below according to the wrapperMode. The sub widgets can use 3 wrapperMode (to be defined in the sub widget properties): - row: the sub widget label is displayed on one row, and the sub widget content on another row. - column: the sub widget label and content are displayed on the same row - noLabel: the sub widget label is not displayed at all.

widgetType.name: faceted_searches_selector
widgetType.documentation: Widget displaying all the registered faceted searches. Hidden in case only one faceted search is registered.

widgetType.name: saved_faceted_searches_selector
widgetType.documentation:
Widget displaying all the saved faceted searches. It displays 2 categories: - Your searches: your saved faceted searches - All searches: all the other users shared saved faceted searches.
The "outcome" property needs to be defined: on which JSF view should we redirect after selecting a saved search.

widgetType.name: faceted_search_directory_tree
widgetType.documentation:
Widget allowing to select one or more values from a Tree constructed from the directory tree specified in the directoryTreeName property.
